Question: X CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Samsung

Concept Flip Phone

- Resembles Galaxy Z Flip 5
- Can flip both sides

Razer

2024 Lexus TX (Gaming Setup)

- Gamer chairs in the back rows
- Four widescreen gaming monitors
- Desk and keyboard at the backseat
- Series of RGB lights

Asus

Dual Screen Tablet

- Runs Windows 11
- Full-sized keyboard
- Pricing around $1,400 (expected)
- Release date to be announced
